UDLText.name: T

Property.name: OrefId
Property.Description: OREF %Id() value of the object being audited. With a ClassName & %Id() pair, we will be able to run a query on ONE specific audited item per class.

Property.name: ClassName
Property.Description: Name of the class being audited.

Property.name: TimeStamp
Property.Description: Stamped in the %OnBeforeSave method of the class. No need to explicitly set when creating an object.

Property.name: Dump
Property.Description: Semicolon delimited key=>value pair hash of the object's properties being audited. eg. ID=>1;DepAlias=>PDCL;IsLiveOnEpicCare=>1;

Method.name: %OnBeforeSave
Method.Description:
This callback method is invoked by the %Save method to provide notification that the object is being saved. It is called before any data is written to disk.

insert will be set to 1 if this object is being saved for the first time.

If this method returns an error then the call to %Save will fail.

Method.name: AppendHashPair
Method.Description: Helper method to build a key=>value; pair with semicolon delimeter. Feed the method a property name and ..Property value, get back a string you can add to the ..Dump value.
